mapper.select: SELECT mrt.`id`, mrt.`create_by` AS createBy, DATE_FORMAT(mrt.`create_time` ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')AS createTime, mrt.`update_by` AS updateBy, DATE_FORMAT(mrt.`update_time` ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateTime, mrt.`rush_name` AS rushName, mrt.`price`, mrt.`purchase_limitation` AS purchaseLimitation, mrt.`group_rewards` AS groupRewards, mrt.`group_rewards_type` AS groupRewardsType, mrt.recommend_group_rewards AS recommendGroupRewards, mrt.recommend_group_rewards_type AS recommendGroupRewardsType, mrt.`transformation_threshold` AS transformationThreshold, mrt.`can_consignment` AS canConsignment, mrt.`marketing_prefecture_id` AS marketingPrefectureId, mrt.`marketing_prefecture_type_id` AS marketingPrefectureTypeId, mrt.`status`, mrt.`status_explain` AS statusExplain, mrt.`sort`, mrt.into_balance AS intoBalance, mrt.into_shopping_credits AS intoShoppingCredits FROM marketing_rush_type mrt ${ew.customSqlSegment}
